channel.title: integration on stemformulas
channel.description: Recent content in integration on stemformulas

item.title: Divergence Theorem
item.description: The divergence theorem is a formula that describes the relationship between the divergence of a vector field and the surface integral of the field over a closed surface.

item.title: Cauchy's Integral Theorem
item.description: A theorem used for line integrals of complex functions.
